roleset.name: create

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: The plant will produce control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.
example.arg: control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.

example.name: passivized
example.text: The test and Learning Materials are both produced by the same company, Macmillan/McGraw-Hill.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: A contractor will produce vital equipment for the Army and Navy.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'produce' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'make'; adjectival 'productive' based on BOLT-4,5.

example.name: adjectival rel: productive
example.text: You would be more productive canvassing for Russ Feingold .

roleset.name: bring to light, show

example.name: Oh, those silly Birthers.
example.text: But [Barack Obama]-1 has yet *-1 to produce a valid birth certificate and is no president of the United States .
example.note: And this is why it's a different sense.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.
